Blog.post: Well ds s e 1st tme dat mo is wrtng a blog.. lolx.. werd hor y start arh.. mo also dont noe.. juz haf e feel of wrtng somethng here to express moself ba... Relatonshps: wat can mo say n a mess... lolx.. NEW GUY: recently got to noe ds guy... a ver fun lovng, carng, understandng guy.. yet we lve apart.. but he wll soon b returnng... to sg... next yr... keke.. enjoyng e tme mo haf wf hm onlne n everythng.. fellngs haf been put coz he real treat mo ver sweet but yet so far dat mo not sure of t at tmes too...well dat day he wanted to call mo howeva was out wf je me.. as usual... she acc mo n dont allow mo to go hm sayng f so mo hong......... zzzzzzzzzz bo banz stayed thru out when backe hm.. he was alread aslp.. sad to say.. feel ver dsapponted wf t.. he was ver tred.. so dd not call.. well dont noe y cld not help to hde mo dsappontment at all.. was so upset.. until ytd.. he called n was so hapi.. enjoy e chat wf hm alotz... askng each other questons.. althought was an oversea call.. mo felt so bad.. well e feelngs for hm was growng stronger day by day.. hope he was also.. b4 we hang up e call he sad " love ya" well real at lost of words.. so mo also sad dat backe coz mo can feel e warmth even we r dat far apart.. he wll b backe soon.. n mo reali hopng for e day to cum.. no matter wat he place an mpt place n mo heart now.. so mo s wllng to wat for dat short perod of tme... hope t hngy wld goes out well when he return... keke... wshng hs return s soon....... haha ddnt now mo can wrte blog after all.. so long.. lolxxx... guess mo wll contnue anoter tme ba... keke
